Package ca.rmen.carmailer

Class Summary
CarMailer This class requires the JavaMail and JSoup libraries.
Mail The contents of a mail and basic headers (from, to, subject).
Mail.Body The body content of the mail.
Parser This class requires the JSoup library.
Recipient A recipient has an e-mail address and an optional set of tags.
SendOptions Parameters to determine how we will send the mail
SmtpCredentials The parameters required to authenticate on an SMTP server.
 

Enum Summary
Parser.BodyType Specify what format the mail body file should be read as.
